raw_body: Lion BANDULA SENARATNA (Kalutara Central). Beloved husband of Anita,​ darling father of Niluka and Apsara,​ brother of late Prasad Senaratna,​ brother-in-law of Christy,​ Mark and Sunil Handalage,​ uncle of Sanjeeva,​ Nadejha and Charleka Senaratna,​ passed away peacefully at home. Remains lie at home : No. 2,​ Aruna Mawatha,​ Nagoda,​ Kalutara. Funeral Saturday 3rd February 2024,​ 4 p.m. at Atawila Crematorium,​ Kalutara.      007387
